modName: Glowy eyes for Argonian and Khajiit vampires
summary: Now the beast vampires can be cool too! Eyes that glow in the dark. Requires Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
8/5/14 - Not really supporting this mod anymore, sorry. If you have problems with it there's nothing I'm going to do except advise you to check if you have any other mods that can conflict with mine (and of course make sure you have the Dawnguard dlc). I've never had any problems with it, running Skyrim 1.9 with 200+ mods. Anyway, you can still use this mod if you want, it has no scripts and is not going to mess up your game forever, and is safe to uninstall should it not work properly for you. If you're looking for an alternative let me direct you to this mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23375/?

These eyes affects only Argonian and Khajiit vampires. Glows in the dark like the human/mer vampire eyes and works for both male and female.

YOU NEED DAWNGUARD FOR THIS MOD TO WORK!! Otherwise your game will crash at the main menu.

To install: extract the rar and put the esp and the two folders into your Data folder.
Or use the mod manager ;)
author: sarcasticshark

files.name: Gloweyes for Argonian and Khajiit vamps
